trans-unit.source: Contains fields that can be used to pass event delegates to a thread-safe <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém campos que podem ser usados para passar eventos delegados para um método <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize" /> thread-safe do <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler" /> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler" /> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler" /> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler" /> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler" /> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler" /> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler" /> that points to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler" /> que aponta para o manipulador de eventos.
